title: Fix ActorGuard loading state stuck issue

requirements.summary: Fix ActorGuard component to correctly detect backend readiness and transition out of loading state when initialize() resolves, treating 'already initialized' and 'Unauthorized' responses as ready states
acceptanceCriteria: On page load, the app no longer stays stuck on 'system not ready yet please wait'
ActorGuard transitions out of the loading state once the actor is available and initialize() resolves
'Already initialized' and 'Unauthorized' responses from initialize() are treated as a ready state
The main app UI renders after the guard clears successfully
If the backend is genuinely unavailable, an appropriate error state is shown rather than an infinite wait

file_operations.description: Fix the ActorGuard component logic to properly handle initialize() responses. Ensure that when initialize() returns true, false, or throws errors containing 'already initialized' or 'Unauthorized', the component treats these as ready states and allows the app to render. Add proper error handling to distinguish between temporary loading states and genuine backend unavailability. Implement a timeout mechanism to show an error state if the backend doesn't respond within a reasonable time (e.g., 30 seconds). Update the loading state management to correctly transition from loading to ready once the actor is available and initialization completes successfully.
